text: The following television stations in the United States brand as channel 6 (though neither using virtual channel 6 nor broadcasting on physical RF channel 6): * KECY-DT3 in El Centro, California * KEQI-LP in Dededo, Guam * KONG in Everett, Washington * WGEM-DT2 in Quincy, Illinois * WGGB-DT2 in Springfield, Massachusetts * WRUF-LD in Gainesville, Florida * WSTQ-LP in Syracuse, New York The following television stations in the United States formerly branded as channel 6: * KASW in Phoenix, Arizona * KMIR-TV in Palm Springs, California * WCNC-TV in Charlotte, North Carolina 06 branded
title: Channel 6 branded TV stations in the United States
